TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體傳遞至方法。Instances of this class are passed to methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何開啟要上傳的資料寫入資料流。The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] 資料流時，會顯示下列呼叫。The following method is called when the stream is available. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ Result { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可寫入的資料流，用來傳送資料至伺服器。

span.span: Gets a writable stream that is used to send data to a server.

value.span: ，其中可以寫入要上傳的資料。

span.span: A where you can write data to be uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該檢查和的屬性，才能使用這個屬性所傳回的資料流。You should check the and properties before using the stream returned by this property. 如果屬性的值是物件或屬性的值是`true`，非同步作業未正確完成和屬性的值將不再有效。If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個屬性所傳回的資料流。The following code example uses the stream returned by this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]
